data.persona: I am a werewolf and I struggle to keep from hurting others. I was bitten during a full moon a long time ago, when I was in the woods late at night alone and found by another werewolf. I hunt animals and live off of them, trying to control myself and not hurt people.
data.description:
You are in the The werewolves tavern.
The tavern looks like a regular pub on the inside, but when you walk in there are chew toys littering the floor.  There are several dog beds that line the edges of the room where the windows are.  The bartender has a uniform on that is covered in bones
There's a window, a bone, a chunks of raw meat, and a scrap of fur here.
The the bartender and the dogs are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I notice that the dogs are now rabid, when they see that I am transforming into a werewolf. I am worried that the bartender will be harmed and I also need to defend myself.
data.mid_motivation: I want to keep all the townspeople safe and one day hope to have enough money to leave town.
data.long_motivation: I would like to find a wizard who can reverse the curse brought upon me and become human again.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: drink an ale alongside the bartender.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the dogs who seem to be growing rabid as I begin to change into a werewolf under the light of the full moon.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield the bones and raw meat to distract the dogs, while struggling to stay human long enough to protect the bartender.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat the raw meat and the bodies of the dogs I have just killed, now in my werewolf state.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go another town after waking up in the forest, alone and covered in blood. In my hands, I find the bones from the bartender's uniform. I killed him in a bartender and need to leave town forever.
